string.text: Blind dog figurine
A blind dog figurine, made by a craftsman who previously resided at the Outpost. Rather high quality with many small details.

Vaccine
A vaccine contraining a strong substance that filters toxins in an organism. The ampule is designed for one application on a human adult. Can cause addiction.
Note from Obscurant
A stalker note written on a sheet of paper torn out of a notebook. To read, click “Use.”

My backpack
My personal backpack that was missing.
